title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (delegation ministerial functions) order 2024

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The powers and duties of the Taoiseach conferred on him by or under –
text_raw:
2. The powers and duties of the Taoiseach conferred on him by or under – 

(a) 

(b) 

the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 21 of 1993), and 

the Civil Service Regulation Acts 1956 to 2005 and the Public 
Service Management (Recruitment and Appointments) Act 2004 
(No. 33 of 2004), in so far as those Acts relate to the Central 
Statistics Office, 

are delegated to Hildegarde Naughton, Minister of State at the Department of 
the Taoiseach. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 
16 April, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 19th April, 2024.
